text: ane avi ja rite ame tamari tarapha potana adesathi ruhane avatarita karya che ane tame a pahela te pana nahata janata ke kitaba ane imana sum che, parantu ame tene nura banavyum, tena dvara potana banda'o manthi jene icchi'e, satya marga batavi'e chi'e, ni:Sanka tame satya marga tarapha margadarsana api rahya cho
